reviews.review: Best SCI-FI Adventure in my life.

Uno de los mejores juegos y de las mejores sagas que puedan jugar, después de tantos años de su lanzamiento sigue siendo un juego que deberías de jugar si o si. También recomiendo la primera parte para tener la experiencia completa.

If you need a puzzle game with a great story, amazingly funny co-op, and endless amount of community maps, and generally good puzzles, this game is for you!

Besides the previously mentioned few ups of portal 2, I can definitely say that this is my favourite game of all time. So much so that I got and beat portal still alive on Xbox, and recently bought it again. After beating it on Xbox as well.

We may not get portal 3, but that doesn't mean whats already there isn't good enough. So buy it.

Игра очень шикарная, весь сюжет завораживает, не дает скучать. Испытания не однообразные и сложность их варьируется и не зависит от того на сколько ты продвинулся в сюжетке. А финал вообще бомбезный. Ставлю 10 из 10.
one of rthe most iconic, greatest puzzle games

I've only played portal 2 for 8 hours yet i can't stop playing its so fun portal 2 innovates on the original so much but still has that portal 1 feel, where should i start... The single player campaign is absolutely amazing i love Wheatley, he is personally my favorite character in the game. The humor is right up my alley it's a nice mix of wittiness and unexpectedness to make me laugh anytime of the day.
       The co-op is just a really nice touch because it works with portal quite well, I've had a lot of fun with this mode and working with my friends and strangers.
    And finally the level editor, just WOW this is amazing to finally have i love making test chambers, i do wish there was more freedom like changing textures or more items other than that i think this mode is a blast.

          9/10 i really recommend portal 2.

This game is fantastic and if you haven't played it yet what are you doing with your life!? 
Ok next part, any game devs reading this hear me out. A sequel to the portal game that takes place in the 80's, you are a homeless person that was paud 60 dollars to do a study at aperture. You start fighting the mantis men and then the whole facility starts falling apart and you get the portal gun and have to solve room puzzles to escape, while also killing more mantis men along the way, so you could have the portal gun and whatevet gun they gave you to kill mantis men. The end of the game would be us witnessing Caroline being downloaded into Glados and her coming online for the first time, squashing the mantis men and killing all extraneous personnel including us. I know lots of run on sentences, but the idea is there, i want zero compensation for this idea, someone please make this game!

Ainda melhor que o primeiro jogo!
Uma história mais evoluída, no qual aprofunda a história contada no primeiro jogo, com mais personagens, lugares para explorar e novos desafios(testes) mais complexos. Embora este segundo jogo se tenha mais focado na história do próprio que o primeiro, o "Portal Gun" e os portais estão muito melhor e a interação que temos com o jogo também é maior que o primeiro.
Os gráficos estão extremamente bons, sem "Quebras de FPS", a iluminação está muito melhor e o detalhe de cada objeto, incluindo da visão de dentro dos portais.
Espero que haja o terceiro, embora as probabilidades sejam poucas.
Recomendo muito o jogo.

Aşırı eğlenceli bir oyundu ve sonunu çok sevdim. Evreni Half-Life ile çakışıyor ve bu çok güzel bir detay sonuçta aynı yapımcının oyunları. Çok Oyunculu moduyla bir arkadaşınız ile de oynayabileceğiniz muazzam bir oyun.
Прекрасная игра, она точно стоит своих денег!
Oynadığım en güzel oyunlardan, steam yaz indirimlerinde kaçırılmamalı. Tek kişilği ayrı 2 kişilği ayrı güzel.
80% игры дрался с другом, а остальные 20% ждал пока он решит загадку. 1000/10
